metadata.title: EcoBloom Summer Campaign Planning
metadata.summary: Team convened to plan the EcoBloom summer campaign, outlining a 2-month duration and key deliverables. Discussions covered content strategy, design concepts, and legal review timelines. The campaign deadline is July 28, 2025.

action_items.task: Finalize content calendar for EcoBloom summer campaign
Design final mockups for EcoBloom summer campaign
Obtain legal approval for all marketing materials
Review and approve content calendar

metadata.title: FitFusion Rebranding Kickoff & Planning
metadata.summary: The FitFusion rebranding project kickoff was discussed, with a deadline of August 15, 2025. Key tasks include design development (3 weeks), brand messaging framework (July 2), and legal review (July 30). The team is prioritizing trademark searches and ensuring legal compliance.

action_items.task: Schedule kickoff meeting for FitFusion rebrand
Develop initial messaging ideas for FitFusion rebrand

metadata.title: GreenScape Sustainability Report Kickoff
metadata.summary: Team initiated the GreenScape sustainability report project, aiming for completion by August 30, 2025. Key discussion points include data collection, content creation, and legal review of environmental claims. The report will highlight GreenScape's 30% carbon emission reduction.

action_items.task: Draft GreenScape's sustainability report content
Review GreenScape's sustainability report draft for legal compliance
